1.title: Awaiting MAC address registration
1.description: The AP has been physically installed and powered on (LEDs visible), but the rXg has not yet detected it.
1.resolution: If the AP remains in this state, confirm it has power and check the Ethernet cable.

2.title: AP is reachable, awaiting import
2.description: The AP has received an IP address and is pingable by the rXg, but has not yet completed the import process.
2.resolution: If stuck, try a pin factory reset. Hold the pin until LED behavior clearly differs from a normal reset. Repeat if unsure.

3.title: Onboarding import running
3.description: The rXg is importing the AP. Most steps are fast, but PKI certificate generation may take time.
3.resolution: If stuck here, perform a pin factory reset.

4.title: Registered, but not approved
4.description: The AP is onboarded but awaits manual approval by a field engineer.
4.resolution: Sites with full ZTP (Zero Touch Provisioning) auto-approve APs and may skip this step.

5.title: Registered and approved, but offline
5.description: The AP has completed onboarding and approval, but is currently unreachable.
5.resolution: The state is commonly found when an AP has been unplugged or lost network connectivity.

6.title: Registered, approved, and online
6.description: The AP is fully operational and connected to the OpenWiFi controller.

1.title: ONT not registered with the OLT
1.description: The ONT has been scanned in but has never been seen by the OLT.
1.resolution: Inspect the fiber connection if the ONT has power and remains in this state.

2.title: ONT seen by OLT, awaiting registration
2.description: The ONT is visible to the OLT but has not yet completed registration.
2.resolution: This state may persist if the ONT is undergoing a firmware update. Please be patient.

3.title: ONT registered, awaiting port provisioning
3.description: The ONT has registered with the OLT, but service ports are not yet provisioned.
3.resolution: This state will take longer for multiport ONTs. A prolonged state here may indicate that Altiplano has crashed.

4.title: ONT offline, but fully provisioned
4.description: All provisioning steps are complete, but the ONT is not currently reachable.
4.resolution: The state is commonly found when an ONT has been unplugged or lost network connectivity.

5.title: ONT online and fully provisioned
5.description: The ONT is fully registered, provisioned, and online.
